name: UNBOX: Newbie's Adventure and Sublevel Zero: Redux
name_original: UNBOX: Newbie's Adventure and Sublevel Zero: Redux
description:
Sublevel Zero - Redux is a first-person roguelike six-degree-of-freedom shooter set in a universe where reality is falling apart. Take control of a lone gunship pilot whose mission is to loot and craft ancient technology. The ultimate postal service has arrived - self-delivering cardboard boxes! Unbox – Newbie’s Adventure is a unique physics-platformer. Enjoy an epic single player adventure or grab up to four friends for local multiplayer races, battles and challenges!

UNBOX: Newbie's Adventure and Sublevel Zero: Redux
Compatible with PlayStation®4.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

UNBOX: Newbie's Adventure developed by Prospect Games, published by Merge Games Ltd. © 2017. UNBOX: Newbie's Adventure and Prospect Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Prospect Games.
Sublevel Zero: Redux developed by SigTrap Games, published by Merge Games Ltd. © 2017. Sublevel Zero: Redux and SigTrap Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of SigTrap Games.
Merge Games is a trademark or registered trademark of Merge Games Ltd. All other trademarks, copyrights and logos are property of their respective owners.
